function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased physical interaction in urban spaces and events.","Impact":"Deadly outbreaks and increased transmission rates of contagious diseases within communities.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce physical interaction, such as remote participation and virtual events. Increase sanitation and hygiene protocols in shared spaces.","Technologies":"Remote communication technologies, virtual event platforms, sanitation and sterilization technologies.","People":"Urban populations, event attendees, communal space users.","Owner":"Local governments, event organizers, facility managers."}]}
